0.1.name: wordpress/oqey-add-ons
0.1.description:
oQey Add-ons is a plugin that add more features for oQey Gallery users. Watermark, crop, featured image and more features are comming.

Features:

  • watermark images on upload, global settings and local option by gallery.
  • crop new thumbnails from existing image.
  • use images as featured for posts and pages.
